title: Thoughts on My Permaban
body:
I don't really give a shit

Well, kinda. I liked this name and it stings that I won't be able to use it anymore, but that's it.

I haven't learned a thing, and you can bet I'll just keep doing this shit in the future.

See ya on the rift, fuckers
